entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Lambton Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:46 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow or ice pellets beginning near noon then changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of drizzle or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to periods of rain and ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches developing late this evening and dissipating before morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
